KPI_Goal_Description: Promptly review construction plans.
KPI_Metric_Description: The percent of jobs (building applications) filed by registered architects and professional engineers who have certified that their submissions are in compliance with the NYC Building Code and applicable zoning regulations.  These jobs do not undergo a regular plan examination but are subject to random audit as well as other DOB reviews.

KPI_Goal_Description: Promptly review construction plans.
KPI_Metric: Average days to complete first plan review – New Buildings – Initial applications (BIS)
KPI_Metric_Description: For plan reviews of initial new building applications completed, the average number of business days for applications to go from D status (application processed - completed) to either J status (disapproved) or P status (approved).

KPI_Goal_Description: Promptly review construction plans.
KPI_Metric: Average days to complete first plan review – Major Renovations (Alteration I) – Initial applications (BIS)
KPI_Metric_Description: For plan reviews of initial major renovation applications completed, the average number of business days for applications to go from D status (application processed - completed) to either J status (disapproved) or P status (approved).

KPI_Goal_Description: Promptly review construction plans.
KPI_Metric: Average days to complete first plan review – Minor Renovations – Initial applications (BIS)
KPI_Metric_Description: For plan reviews of initial minor renovation applications completed, the average number of business days for applications to go from D status (application processed - completed) to either J status (disapproved) or P status (approved).

KPI_Goal_Description: Rigorously enforce building and zoning laws.
KPI_Metric_Description: The number of construction inspections completed citywide.

KPI_Goal_Description: Prevent construction-related fatalities and injuries.
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of events on a construction site (with or without a work permit) that DOB responded to within the reporting period.  An event or incident includes accidents and anything other than a scheduled inspection.

KPI_Goal_Description: Prevent construction-related fatalities and injuries.
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of persons injured (fatalities and non-fatalities) as a result of construction activity. This includes injuries occurring at a construction site or related to an incident at a construction site.

KPI_Goal_Description: Prevent construction-related fatalities and injuries.
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of fatalities that occurred on a construction site, or was related to an incident at a construction site, that was a result of construction activity.

KPI_Goal_Description: Prevent construction-related fatalities and injuries.
KPI_Metric_Description: The percent of incident inspections that resulted in the issuance of a written violation within the reporting period.

KPI_Goal_Description: Improve processing efficiency.
KPI_Metric: (RETIRED) Certificates of occupancy issued (permanent and initial temporary)
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of initial temporary Certificates of Occupancy issued plus the number of final Certificates of Occupancy issued during the reporting period.

KPI_Goal_Description: Rigorously enforce building and zoning laws.
KPI_Metric: Office of Administrative Trials and Hearings violations issued
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of violations issued by DOB that fall under the jurisdiction of the Environmental Control Board.  Initially reported data for the Preliminary Mayor’s Management Report (PMMR) and annual Mayor’s Management Report (MMR) is typically incomplete due to data entry backlog and routinely updated in subsequent releases of the MMR.

KPI_Goal_Description: Increase public access to government information.
KPI_Metric_Description: The number of calls received by the Customer Service Center by dialing 3-1-1 directly by dialing 212-NEWYORK, the number available to callers outside the five boroughs of the City or by dialing agency call centers or hotlines that were consolidated into 311 operations.

KPI_Goal_Description: Improve the efficiency of public access to government services
KPI_Metric_Description: The percentage of calls answered by a call center representative in 30 seconds or less. Time begins after initial prerecorded messages.

KPI_Goal_Description: Comply with all federal and State drinking water quality standards and monitor and respond to customer-reported aesthetic issues.
KPI_Metric: In-City samples meeting water quality standards for coliform bacteria (%)
KPI_Metric_Description: The percent of time the City drinking water meets the State quality standard for coliform bacteria. This is a standard measure of microbiological purity for drinking water.

KPI_Goal_Description: Ensure that customer billing is accurate, transparent and fair.
KPI_Metric: Average daily in-City water consumption (millions of gallons)
KPI_Metric_Description: The mean number of gallons delivered each day for in-City consumption.

KPI_Goal_Description: Maintain high levels of compliance with federal and State treatment standards for wastewater and sewage entering receiving waters.
KPI_Metric: Water resource recovery facility effluent meeting State Pollutant Discharge Elimination Standards (%)
KPI_Metric_Description: The percent of treated wastewater leaving in-City treatment plants that meet State Pollutant Discharge Elimination Standards for suspended solids and biochemical oxygen demand.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The number of water main breaks responded to by DEP.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The percent of all hydrants in the City which are broken and inoperative. There are approximately 110,180 fire hydrants in the City.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The average amount of time that DEP takes to resolve a sewer backup from the time the complaint is received. Resolution of a complaint can occur by clearing of a blockage or an inspection that reveals no backup or that the problem is on private infrastructure.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The average number of calendar days between receipt and resolution for complaints of clogged catch basins.  One complaint can involve multiple catch basins.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of complaints received by the Department concerning street cave-ins or street depressions. A cave-in is described as the collapse of roadway surface in which the pavement has cracked and fallen into a deep empty space without a solid bottom beneath the street surface.

KPI_Goal_Description: Ensure that customer billing is accurate, transparent and fair.
KPI_Metric_Description: The proportion of water and sewer bills mailed that are not based on actual meter readings.

KPI_Goal_Description: Meet revenue targets established by the NYC Water Board.
KPI_Metric_Description: Total amount of money collected by DEP for water and sewer charges.

KPI_Goal_Description: Investigate complaints in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric: Asbestos complaints responded to within three hours (%)
KPI_Metric_Description: The percent of complaints concerning asbestos responded to within three hours of receipt.

KPI_Goal_Description: Investigate complaints in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric: Air quality complaints responded to within seven days (%)
KPI_Metric_Description: The percent of complaints concerning air quality responded to within seven days of receipt.

KPI_Goal_Description: Investigate complaints in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric: Noise complaints not requiring access to premises responded to within seven days (%)
KPI_Metric_Description: The percent of complaints concerning noise, not requiring scheduling with the complainant, responded to within seven days.

KPI_Goal_Description: Investigate complaints in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric: Average days to close noise complaints
KPI_Metric_Description: The average number of calendar days between receipt of a noise complaint and closure of the complaint for complaints closed during the reporting period.  A complaint is closed when no further action will be taken on it by DEP.   This includes instances where, upon investigation, no infractions of applicable rules/regulations were found, or infractions were present and a Notice of Violation was issued.

KPI_Goal_Description: Investigate complaints in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of noise complaints received during the reporting period.

KPI_Goal_Description: Investigate complaints in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of air quality complaints received during the reporting period.

KPI_Goal_Description: Investigate complaints in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of asbestos complaints received during the reporting period.

KPI_Goal_Description: Comply with all federal and State drinking water quality standards and monitor and respond to customer-reported aesthetic issues.
KPI_Metric: Samples testing positive for coliform bacteria (%)
KPI_Metric_Description: The percent of samples of City drinking water testing positive for coliform bacteria during the period.  This is a standard evaluation of the microbiological purity of drinking water.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric: Average time to restore water to customers after confirming breaks (hours)
KPI_Metric_Description: The average number of hours that it takes DEP to restore water service to affected customers from the time the water to the main with the break is shut off until water is restored.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of leak complaints received during the reporting period; includes complaints on both City and private infrastructure.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric: Average time to repair or replace high-priority broken or inoperative hydrants (days)
KPI_Metric_Description: The average number of calendar days it takes DEP to fix a high-priority broken or inoperative hydrant. High-priority repairs and replacements are designated by the NYC Fire Department.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of clogged catch basin complaints received during the reporting period.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric_Description: The total number of sewer backup complaints received during the reporting period.

KPI_Goal_Description: Resolve emergencies and perform preventive maintenance and required repairs to the water distribution and wastewater collection systems in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric: Average time to respond to street cave-in complaints and make safe (days)
KPI_Metric_Description: The average number of days it took DEP to respond to street cave-ins/depression complaints and resolve related danger during the period.

KPI_Goal_Description: Meet revenue targets established by the NYC Water Board.
KPI_Metric_Description: The percent of billed amount that is collected by DEP with 30 days of distribution.

KPI_Goal_Description: Meet revenue targets established by the NYC Water Board.
KPI_Metric: Total revenue as percent of target (%)
KPI_Metric_Description: Total monies actually collected by DEP for water and sewer charges as a percentage of planned collections for the period.

KPI_Goal_Description: Investigate complaints in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric: Average days to close air quality complaints
KPI_Metric_Description: The average number of calendar days between receipt of an air quality complaint and closure of the complaint for complaints closed during the reporting period.  A complaint is closed when no further action will be taken on it by DEP.   This includes instances where, upon investigation, no infractions of applicable rules/regulations were found, or infractions were present and a Notice of Violation was issued.

KPI_Goal_Description: Investigate complaints in a timely manner.
KPI_Metric: Average days to close asbestos complaints
KPI_Metric_Description: The average number of days between receipt of an asbestos complaint and closure of the complaint for complaints closed during the reporting period. A complaint is closed when the asbestos issue described in the complaint has either been resolved or determined to be unfounded based on the Department’s inspection; when the complaint location is an abandoned building and access is not possible; or when more information is required and contact information for the complainant is not available.  If the Department issues a Notice of Violation for infractions of applicable rules/regulations and corrective action is required, then a follow-up inspection is done to ensure compliance.

KPI_Goal_Description: Stay ahead and be prepared for winter storms and impacts.
KPI_Metric_Description: Total amount of snow, in inches, that has fallen during the reporting period.

KPI_Goal_Description: Stay ahead and be prepared for winter storms and impacts.
KPI_Metric_Description: Amount of salt used, in tons, due to snowfall and icy conditions.

KPI_Goal_Description: Increase street and sidewalk cleanliness.
KPI_Metric_Description: Percentage of over 6,000 sample blocks rated acceptably clean by Mayor’s Office field inspectors, based on a seven-point picture-based rating scale. Figures show averages based on twice-monthly ratings of the citywide street sample. Source:	Mayor’s Office of Operations.

KPI_Goal_Description: Increase street and sidewalk cleanliness.
KPI_Metric_Description: On a scale of 1.0 (a clean street with no litter) to 3.0 (a street where litter is highly concentrated along the curbs and overflowing onto the sidewalk), the percent of streets with a rating of 1.75 or higher (filthy).

KPI_Goal_Description: Increase street and sidewalk cleanliness.
KPI_Metric_Description: Percent of over 6,000 sample blocks rated acceptably clean by Mayor's Office field inspectors, based on a seven-point picture-based rating scale. Figures show annual averages based on twice-monthly ratings of the citywide sidewalk sample.

KPI_Goal_Description: Increase street and sidewalk cleanliness.
KPI_Metric_Description: On a scale of 1.0 (a clean sidewalk with no litter) to 3.0 (a street where litter is highly concentrated along the curbs and overflowing onto the sidewalk), the percent of sidewalks with a rating of 1.75 or higher (filthy).

KPI_Goal_Description: Improve efficiency of waste handling.
KPI_Metric_Description: Percentage of curbside refuse tonnage scheduled for collection but not removed by midnight. Excludes holiday weeks and missed collections due to snow events.

KPI_Goal_Description: Increase the percentage of waste recycled.
KPI_Metric_Description: Percent of curbside and containerized recycling tonnage scheduled for collection but not removed by midnight. Excludes holiday weeks.

KPI_Goal_Description: Improve efficiency of waste handling.
KPI_Metric_Description: Average curbside household refuse tons collected by each truck working an eight-hour shift.
